snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the Web include an argument about how Twitter might, in fact, be making children smarter. Plus, a roundup of the most influential emotions on Twitter.
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the Web include an argument about how Twitter might, in fact, be making children smarter. Plus, a roundup of the most influential emotions on Twitter.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Kids Tweet the Darndest Things, and the Influence of Anger
